nodes.id: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

zh-cn: 关于个人崇拜及其后果
赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上的秘密报告
en: On the Cult of Personality and Its Consequences

description.zh-cn: 由时任苏共中央第一书记赫鲁晓夫在苏联共产党第二十次代表大会上发表的演说。该报告批判了前任领导人斯大林的个人崇拜和严重错误，开启了“去斯大林化”和“赫鲁晓夫解冻”时期，并对国际共产主义运动产生了深远影响。
description.en: A speech delivered by then First Secretary of the CPSU Nikita Khrushchev at the 20th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. The report criticized the personality cult and grave errors of his predecessor Joseph Stalin, initiating the period of 'de-Stalinization' and the 'Khrushchev Thaw,' and had a profound impact on the international communist movement.

nodes.id: 尼基塔·谢尔盖耶维奇·赫鲁晓夫

zh-cn: 尼基塔·谢尔盖耶维奇·赫鲁晓夫

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会第一书记。在苏共二十大上发表“秘密报告”，批判斯大林个人崇拜，并推行“去斯大林化”和“赫鲁晓夫解冻”政策。
description.en: A Soviet statesman who served as the First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. He delivered the 'Secret Speech' at the 20th Party Congress, denouncing Stalin's cult of personality and initiating the policies of de-Stalinization and the Khrushchev Thaw.

description.zh-cn: 苏联前任领导人，其个人崇拜和在大清洗等事件中的严重错误在赫鲁晓夫的秘密报告中受到批判。
description.en: Former leader of the Soviet Union, whose cult of personality and grave errors, such as during the Great Purge, were criticized in Khrushchev's Secret Speech.

nodes.id: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

zh-cn: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会
en: 20th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫在此次大会的最后一天秘密会议上发表了《关于个人崇拜及其后果》的报告。
description.en: At a secret session on the last day of this congress, Khrushchev delivered his speech 'On the Cult of Personality and Its Consequences'.

description.zh-cn: 对前苏联领导人约瑟夫·斯大林的个人崇拜现象，是赫鲁晓夫秘密报告批判的核心内容之一。
description.en: The personality cult of former Soviet leader Joseph Stalin, which was a central theme of criticism in Khrushchev's Secret Speech.

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫发表秘密报告后在苏联及东欧集团国家推行的一系列清除斯大林主义影响的政治运动。
description.en: A series of political reforms in the Soviet Union and Eastern Bloc countries after Khrushchev's Secret Speech, aimed at eradicating the influence of Stalinism.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林去世后，苏联在赫鲁晓夫领导下社会、文化领域出现的一段相对自由化的时期，其开端与秘密报告密切相关。
description.en: A period of relative liberalization in the Soviet Union's social and cultural spheres under Khrushchev after Stalin's death, closely associated with the Secret Speech.

description.zh-cn: 全球范围内的共产主义政党和社会运动。赫鲁晓夫的秘密报告在其中引发了思想混乱和分裂，如中苏交恶。
description.en: The global movement of communist parties and social movements. Khrushchev's Secret Speech caused ideological confusion and schisms within it, such as the Sino-Soviet split.

description.zh-cn: 美国报纸，于1956年6月5日首次向全世界公开发表了赫鲁晓夫秘密报告的全文。
description.en: An American newspaper that first published the full text of Khrushchev's Secret Speech to the world on June 5, 1956.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府主要情报机构之一。从以色列情报机构获得秘密报告文稿后，经总统批准将其披露给《纽约时报》。
description.en: A principal intelligence agency of the U.S. federal government. After obtaining the text of the Secret Speech from Israeli intelligence, it disclosed it to The New York Times with presidential approval.

nodes.id: 以色列情报及特别行动局

zh-cn: 以色列情报及特别行动局

description.zh-cn: 以色列的情报机构，从波兰华沙获得了赫鲁晓夫秘密报告的完整演讲稿，并将其转交美国。
description.en: The national intelligence agency of Israel, which obtained a complete copy of Khrushchev's Secret Speech from Warsaw, Poland, and passed it to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国总统，批准了将赫鲁晓夫秘密报告的文稿披露给媒体的行动。
description.en: The incumbent U.S. President who approved the action to disclose the text of Khrushchev's Secret Speech to the media.

nodes.id: 米哈伊尔·谢尔盖耶维奇·戈尔巴乔夫

zh-cn: 米哈伊尔·谢尔盖耶维奇·戈尔巴乔夫

description.zh-cn: 苏联最后一任最高领导人。在其“开放政策”时期，于1989年首次在苏联国内公开发表了赫鲁晓夫秘密报告的全文。
description.en: The last leader of the Soviet Union. During his 'Glasnost' period, he first published the full text of Khrushchev's Secret Speech within the USSR in 1989.

en: Presidium of the Central Committee of the CPSU

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党的最高决策机构之一，同意了赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上作关于个人崇拜报告的提议。
description.en: One of the highest decision-making bodies of the CPSU, which agreed to Khrushchev's proposal to deliver a report on the cult of personality at the 20th Party Congress.

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党官员，领导一个专门委员会调查斯大林时期的政治迫害案件，并负责起草了赫鲁晓夫秘密报告的初稿。
description.en: A CPSU official who led a special commission to investigate cases of political persecution during the Stalin era and was responsible for drafting the initial version of Khrushchev's Secret Speech.

description.zh-cn: 列宁在晚年口授的一系列文件，其中批评了斯大林的个性和能力，并建议将其从总书记职位上调离。赫鲁晓夫在秘密报告中引用了此文件。
description.en: A series of documents dictated by Lenin in his later years, which criticized Stalin's personality and abilities and recommended his removal from the post of General Secretary. Khrushchev cited this document in his Secret Speech.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代苏联发生的大规模政治镇压运动。赫鲁晓夫的秘密报告揭露了斯大林在此运动中的核心作用和残酷手段。
description.en: A campaign of large-scale political repression in the Soviet Union in the 1930s. Khrushchev's Secret Speech exposed Stalin's central role and brutal methods in this campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与苏联之间自20世纪50年代末开始的政治和意识形态冲突。赫鲁晓夫的秘密报告是导致关系破裂的重要诱因之一。
description.en: The political and ideological conflict between the People's Republic of China and the Soviet Union starting in the late 1950s. Khrushchev's Secret Speech was a significant contributing factor to the breakdown of relations.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。他反对赫鲁晓夫对斯大林的批判，指责苏共搞“修正主义”，最终导致中苏交恶。
description.en: The principal founder and leader of the People's Republic of China. He opposed Khrushchev's criticism of Stalin, accusing the CPSU of 'revisionism,' which ultimately led to the Sino-Soviet split.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾作为中共代表团成员参加苏共二十大。他私下认为赫鲁晓夫批判斯大林的做法是“胡来”。
description.en: A Chinese politician who attended the 20th Congress of the CPSU as a member of the CCP delegation. He privately considered Khrushchev's criticism of Stalin to be reckless.

description.zh-cn: 时任波兰统一工人党第一书记，在参加苏共二十大期间，因读到赫鲁晓夫的秘密报告后遭受强烈刺激，突发心脏病猝死。
description.en: Then First Secretary of the Polish United Workers' Party, who suffered a fatal heart attack in Moscow during the 20th CPSU Congress after being severely shocked by reading Khrushchev's Secret Speech.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，于1964年发动政变推翻赫鲁晓夫。其执政时期终止了“去斯大林化”，并部分恢复了对斯大林的正面评价。
description.en: A Soviet politician who overthrew Khrushchev in a 1964 coup. His rule terminated de-Stalinization and partially restored a positive assessment of Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，与勃列日涅夫等人共同发动政变推翻了赫鲁晓夫。
description.en: A Soviet politician who, along with Brezhnev and others, staged a coup to overthrow Khrushchev.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的缔造者和首任最高领导人。他反对“去斯大林化”，并在国内对相关支持者进行了政治清洗。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. He opposed de-Stalinization and conducted a political purge against its supporters domestically.

en: Communist Party of the Russian Federation

description.zh-cn: 苏联解体后在俄罗斯成立的共产党，自认为是苏联共产党的继承者。
description.en: A communist party in Russia established after the dissolution of the Soviet Union, considering itself the successor to the CPSU.

en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联的执政党，赫鲁晓夫在该党第二十次代表大会上发表了秘密报告。
description.en: The ruling party of the Soviet Union. Khrushchev delivered his Secret Speech at its 20th Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。在毛泽东领导下，该党反对赫鲁晓夫的秘密报告，认为其是修正主义，并最终导致中苏交恶。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China. Under Mao Zedong's leadership, the party opposed Khrushchev's Secret Speech, deeming it revisionist, which ultimately led to the Sino-Soviet split.

relationships.source: 尼基塔·谢尔盖耶维奇·赫鲁晓夫
relationships.target: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 在苏联共产党第二十次代表大会的秘密会议上发表了《关于个人崇拜及其后果》的报告。
description.en: Delivered the speech 'On the Cult of Personality and Its Consequences' at a secret session of the 20th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 报告系统性地抨击了斯大林在位期间的严重错误和罪行。
description.en: The speech systematically attacked the grave errors and crimes of Joseph Stalin during his rule.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 报告的核心内容之一是批判对斯大林的个人崇拜。
description.en: One of the core themes of the speech was the criticism of the cult of personality surrounding Stalin.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 该报告的发表标志着苏联“去斯大林化”运动的开始。
description.en: The delivery of this speech marked the beginning of the de-Stalinization campaign in the Soviet Union.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 该报告是推动“赫鲁晓夫解冻”时期一系列社会和政治改革的关键事件。
description.en: The speech was a key event that propelled a series of social and political reforms during the 'Khrushchev Thaw'.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 报告在国际共产主义运动中引发了思想混乱和分裂，例如中苏交恶。
description.en: The speech caused ideological confusion and schisms within the international communist movement, such as the Sino-Soviet split.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 该报告是中国共产党与苏联共产党意识形态分歧的开端，是中苏交恶的重要诱因。
description.en: The speech marked the beginning of ideological divergence between the CCP and the CPSU and was a major cause of the Sino-Soviet split.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 时任波兰统一工人党第一书记贝鲁特在读到报告后，因遭受强烈刺激突发心脏病猝死。
description.en: Bolesław Bierut, then First Secretary of the Polish United Workers' Party, suffered a fatal heart attack after being severely shocked by reading the report.

relationships.target: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 会议决定委托赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上作关于个人崇拜的报告。
description.en: The Presidium decided to entrust Khrushchev with delivering a report on the cult of personality at the 20th Party Congress.

relationships.target: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 作为专门委员会的负责人，向苏共中央主席团提交了秘密报告的初稿。
description.en: As head of a special commission, he submitted the initial draft of the Secret Speech to the Presidium of the CPSU Central Committee.

relationships.source: 以色列情报及特别行动局

description.zh-cn: 将从波兰华沙获得的秘密报告讲稿转送给美国中央情报局。
description.en: Transferred the text of the Secret Speech, obtained from Warsaw, Poland, to the Central Intelligence Agency.

description.zh-cn: 在时任总统艾森豪威尔批准下，将秘密报告讲稿披露给《纽约时报》。
description.en: With the approval of then-President Eisenhower, it disclosed the text of the Secret Speech to The New York Times.

description.zh-cn: 批准将秘密报告讲稿披露给媒体，最终由《纽约时报》发表。
description.en: Approved the disclosure of the Secret Speech manuscript to the media, which was ultimately published by The New York Times.

relationships.source: 米哈伊尔·谢尔盖耶维奇·戈尔巴乔夫
relationships.target: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 首次在苏联境内将赫鲁晓夫秘密报告的全文公开发表。
description.en: Published the full text of Khrushchev's Secret Speech publicly within the Soviet Union for the first time.

description.zh-cn: 该文件中，列宁批评斯大林太粗暴并滥用职权，建议研究将其从总书记职位上调离。
description.en: In this document, Lenin criticized Stalin for being too rude and abusing his power, and recommended considering his removal from the post of General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫的报告揭露，斯大林是“大清洗”的直接推动者，并批准使用酷刑。
description.en: Khrushchev's report revealed that Stalin was the direct instigator of the 'Great Purge' and approved the use of torture.

relationships.target: 尼基塔·谢尔盖耶维奇·赫鲁晓夫

description.zh-cn: 反对赫鲁晓夫对斯大林的批判，指责苏共搞“修正主义”，最终导致中苏交恶。
description.en: Opposed Khrushchev's criticism of Stalin, accused the CPSU of 'revisionism,' which ultimately led to the Sino-Soviet split.

relationships.target: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 作为中共代表团成员，私下表示赫鲁晓夫批判斯大林的做法是“胡来”（鲁莽行事）。
description.en: As a member of the CCP delegation, he privately commented that Khrushchev's method of criticizing Stalin was 'reckless'.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜国内对“去斯大林化”的支持者展开了政治清洗。
description.en: Conducted a political purge in North Korea against supporters of de-Stalinization.

relationships.target: 尼基塔·谢尔盖耶维奇·赫鲁晓夫

description.zh-cn: 伙同他人发动政变，推翻了赫鲁晓夫，并取而代之。
description.en: Along with others, he staged a coup that overthrew Khrushchev and replaced him.

relationships.target: 尼基塔·谢尔盖耶维奇·赫鲁晓夫

description.zh-cn: 参与了推翻赫鲁晓夫的政变。
description.en: Participated in the coup that overthrew Khrushchev.

description.zh-cn: 其领导层于1966年初决定终止“去斯大林化”运动，并开始实行“静悄悄的斯大林化”。
description.en: His leadership decided in early 1966 to terminate the de-Stalinization campaign and began to implement a 'quiet re-Stalinization'.

relationships.target: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 其代表大会通过决议，认定赫鲁晓夫关于斯大林个人崇拜的报告是错误的。
description.en: Its party congress passed a resolution deeming Khrushchev's report on Stalin's cult of personality to be erroneous.

description.zh-cn: 因赫鲁晓夫的秘密报告等事件引发意识形态分歧，两党关系破裂，展开论战并进入长期敌对状态，史称中苏交恶。
description.en: Due to ideological differences sparked by events like Khrushchev's Secret Speech, relations between the two parties ruptured, leading to polemics and a long-term state of hostility known as the Sino-Soviet split.
